event: Earliest human presence on Saint Kitts and Nevis
English establish the first permanent settlement on Saint Kitts
French and English jointly colonize Saint Kitts
Sugar plantations expand using enslaved African labor
Britain gains full control of Saint Kitts
Slavery is abolished under British rule
Saint Kitts, Nevis, and Anguilla are administratively united
Saint Kitts and Nevis gains independence from the United Kingdom
